newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - TSI International started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - TSI International started.

text.p: Robertson, Stephens & Co said research analyst Marshall Senk initiated coverage of TSI International Software Ltd with a buy rating.
-- said he believes TSI has strong potential with 47 percent revenue growth forecast for 1998, driven primarily by the 80 percent growth in the company's SAP R/3 product line.
-- expects TSI to earn post 1997 revenues of $24.5 million in revenues and earnings per share from continuing operations of $0.16.
-- expects TSI to generate 1998 revenues of $36.1 million and earnings per share from continuing operations of $0.31.

-- said believes demand for TSI's products will be driven primarily by continued strong demand for SAP R/3, continuing deployment of new client/server and Web corporate systems, which need to be linked to existing systems, and increased development in Internet-based applications.
